# <a name="permanently-delete-email-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="f7c24-102">Excluir permanentemente o e-mail em Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f7c24-102">Permanently delete email in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f7c24-103">Se pretender apagar o e-mail ou esvaziar a sua caixa de entrada:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f7c24-103">If you want to delete email or empty your inbox:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="f7c24-104">Selecione as mensagens que pretende eliminar (ou selecione o círculo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f7c24-104">Select the messages you want to delete (or select the circle</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="f7c24-105">ao lado da **Caixa de Entrada** no topo da sua lista de mensagens para selecionar todas as mensagens na sua caixa de entrada).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f7c24-105">next to **Inbox** at the top of your message list to select all messages in your inbox).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="f7c24-106">Na parte superior da página, selecione **Delete** (para toda a **pasta Vazia**, ou **Empty Focused** / **Empty Other** se tiver a caixa de entrada focada ativada).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f7c24-106">At the top of the page, select **Delete** (for the whole folder **Empty folder**, or **Empty Focused** / **Empty Other** if you have Focused Inbox enabled).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="f7c24-107">Para expurgar todos os seus e-mails eliminados, abra a [pasta 'Itens Eliminados'](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) e selecione a **pasta Vazia,** em seguida, selecione **itens recuperáveis** na parte superior da página e selecione novamente a **pasta Empty.**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f7c24-107">To purge all your deleted email, open your [Deleted Items folder](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) and select **Empty folder**, then select **Recoverable items** at the top of the page and select **Empty folder** again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f7c24-108">Para saber mais, leia o [email a eliminar Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f7c24-108">To learn more, read [Delete email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
